text: personal R package storing useful functions daily work.

text: can install development version zutils GitHub : can install stable version zutils r-universe :

what: Create a call to a function with its arguments — call_full
title: Create a call to a function with its arguments — call_full
text: basically wrapper around rlang::call2() allows extract arguments function pass rlang::call2() without type .

title: Create a call to a function with its arguments — call_full
Create a call to a function with its arguments — call_full
text: .fn function call. ... Arguments pass function.

title: Create a call to a function with its arguments — call_full
text: call function arguments.

title: Cautiously evaluate an expression — cautiously
text: function useful want evaluate expression, want catch errors return default value instead. Note error message printed warning name function suggests.

title: Cautiously evaluate an expression — cautiously
text: .f function modify. See as_function() details. otherwise value return expression throws error.

title: Cautiously evaluate an expression — cautiously
text: function evaluates expression returns result default value error thrown.

title: Tidy select for list — select_list
text: tidy select interface lists. See tidyselect::eval_select() details.

title: Tidy select for list — select_list
text: .l list() object. ... One unquoted expressions separated commas.

title: Tidy select for list — select_list
text: list selected elements.

what: Separate a column into multiple columns — separate_wider_dsv
title: Separate a column into multiple columns — separate_wider_dsv
text: wrapper around tidyr::separate_wider_regex() allows split column multiple columns. column contains -called delimiter separated values (DSV) values extracted using regular expressions.

title: Separate a column into multiple columns — separate_wider_dsv
code: separate_wider_dsv(   data,   col,   names,   ...,   patterns = NULL,   delim = "_",   prefix = NULL,   suffix = NULL )

title: Separate a column into multiple columns — separate_wider_dsv
text: data data frame. col <tidy-select> Column separate. names Names new columns. Use NA want component output. ... Additional arguments passed tidyr::separate_wider_regex(). patterns Regular expressions extract values column. NULL, pattern match character non-greedily. length vector must equal number new columns. delim Delimiter used column separate different pieces values. prefix, suffix Prefix suffix removed target column retrieve values.

title: Separate a column into multiple columns — separate_wider_dsv
text: data frame separated columns.
